docs.snippet: About 25 dead cats found in plastic bags hanging from trees in a New York suburb were apparently killed with blows to the head at various times over the past year, an investigator said Friday....
docs.lead_paragraph: About 25 dead cats found in plastic bags hanging from trees in a New York suburb were apparently killed with blows to the head at various times over the past year, an investigator said Friday.

docs.snippet: Surveillance footage from Justin Bieber's home appears to show the pop star high-fiving friends and celebrating after throwing eggs at a neighbor's home in January, an investigator's affidavit released Friday shows....

docs.snippet: Russia announced military exercises along the border with Ukraine on Thursday, prompting a warning from Secretary of State John Kerry that Moscow would face additional sanctions if it does not act to ease tensions....
docs.lead_paragraph: Russia announced military exercises along the border with Ukraine on Thursday, prompting a warning from Secretary of State John Kerry that Moscow would face additional sanctions if it does not act to ease tensions.
docs.abstract: Russia announces military exercises along its border with Ukraine, prompting a warning from United States Sec of State John Kerry that Moscow will face additional sanctions if it does not act to ease tensions.

headline.main: Russia to Start Drills, Warning Ukraine Over Mobilization
headline.print_headline: Ukraine’s Attack on Militants Succeeds Only in Riling Russia

byline.contributor: C. J. Chivers reported from Slovyansk; Neil MacFarquhar from Moscow; and Andrew Higgins from Kiev, Ukraine. Reporting was contributed by Andrew Roth and Noah Sneider from Slovyansk, David M. Herszenhorn from Moscow, Michael R. Gordon from Washington and Alan Cowell from London.
byline.original: By C. J. CHIVERS, NEIL MacFARQUHAR and ANDREW HIGGINS
